content: M â€“ F 10:00AM to 9:00PM, Sa 10:00AM to 8:00PM, Su 11:00AM to 7:00PM. Shopping mall anchored by Macy's, JC Penny's and Nordstrom (Opening 2008). Restaurants include Cheesecake Factory, Sisley Italian Restaurant, Johnny Rockets and smaller food outlets.
